sentences.cn: 一种腐蚀性很强的物质

sentences.en: Balanced formula to make oil with good anti - corrosive and anti - rust properties.
sentences.cn: 平衡的配方使油品具有良好的 防 腐蚀性及 防锈 性能.

sentences.en: For steel structures in severe corrosive environment, both above and below waterline.
sentences.cn: 用于严重腐蚀环境下钢结构的保护, 水线以上或水线以下均可使用.

sentences.en: Gasfired heaters should not be used in corrosive or explosive atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 燃烧煤气的加热器不宜用于有腐蚀性或危险性的气体中.

sentences.en: He had again the corrosive sense of failure that always dogged him.
sentences.cn: 老是摆脱不掉的那种侵心的不争气之感,顿时又笼罩在他的心头.

sentences.en: In industry, diamond can form a tough, non-corrosive coating for tools.
sentences.cn: 在工业上，金刚石可以用作工具表面坚固、耐腐蚀的覆盖层。

sentences.en: It's quite important to gain the ability to cope successfully with corrosive atmospheres and particles.
sentences.cn: 很重要的是获得能够成功地克服气体和粒子腐蚀的能力.

sentences.en: Many highly corrosive substances are used in the nuclear industry.
sentences.cn: 核工业使用许多腐蚀性很强的物质.

sentences.en: Sodium and sulphur are highly corrosive.
Sulfur oxides ( SOX. ) are acrid, corrosive, poisonous gases produced when fuel containing sulfur is burned.
sentences.cn: 硫氧化物 ( SOX ) 是辛辣的腐蚀性的有毒气体,产生于含硫燃料的燃烧.

sentences.en: The bed of a river is partly worn away by corrosive action.
sentences.cn: 河床部分地就是被这种侵蚀作用冲蚀的.

sentences.en: the corrosive effects of salt water
The corrosive thing of rubber film is observed in fuel press adjuster.
sentences.cn: 通过疲劳实验,观察燃油压力调节器中橡胶膜片受腐蚀的情况.

sentences.en: The wall must be protected against chemical attack from highly corrosive components of the combusting gases.
sentences.cn: 必须把室壁保护起来以防止来自燃气的高度腐蚀性成分的化学侵蚀.

sentences.en: They appear to be very sensitive to mildly corrosive environments.
sentences.cn: 它们似乎对轻度的腐蚀环境非常敏感.

words.tran_cn: 腐蚀；腐蚀产生的物质；衰败

trans.tran_cn: 腐蚀性的，侵蚀性的，（对社会、个人情感等）有害的，（语言）激烈的
trans.tran_en: a corrosive liquid such as an acid can destroy metal, plastic etc
